Class DynamicThemePreview

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class DynamicThemePreview
extends ThemePreview
    A ThemePreview to show the dynamic app theme preview according to the selected values.

      • onEnabled

        protected void onEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Description copied from class: DynamicView
        This method will be called whenever there is a change in the view state.

        Either enabled or disabled, other views like icon, title, color, etc. must be updated here to reflect the overall view state.

        Overrides:
        onEnabled in class ThemePreview
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if this view is enabled and can receive click events.
